com.ikalagaming.entity.component

Class Effects

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.ikalagaming.entity.component.Component
      • com.ikalagaming.entity.component.Effects

  • public class Effects
extends Component
    Allows the entity to have effects applied to it.
    Author:
    Ches Burks
